alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 6:06PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A COLLAPSING THUNDERSTORM PRODUCING GUSTY WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NAVAJO COUNTY INCLUDING JOSEPH CITY AND HOLBROOK THROUGH 730 PM MDT... At 704 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a collapsing thunderstorm producing gusty winds near Joseph City, or 22 miles southeast of Winslow, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Holbrook, Joseph City, Clear Creek Reservoir, Woodruff, Manila, Homolovi State Park, Hibbard, Sun Valley, Holbrook Airport, Little Painted Desert Park, Twin Lake, Homolovi State Park Campground, and Dry Lake. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 256 and 289. Interstate 40 between mile markers 257 and 299. State Route 377 between mile markers 13 and 33. State Route 87 between mile markers 346 and 358. State Route 77 between mile markers 368 and 404. State Route 99 between mile markers 25 and 40. Highway 180 between mile markers 308 and 318. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Driving a vehicle may become difficult due to strong winds.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
